syllabus:
Commercial Space Design I 

開課系級 設計系3年級   
  
課程簡紹 

This course focuses on the practices of planning, meeting functional requirements, developing design concept, articulating client’s needs, and creating interior design.    
Students will develop a detailed understanding of commercial interior design and gain the abilities to integrate ergonomic needs, transform design thinking, and execute proposals.   
  
課程目標 

*   Acknowledge the fundamental knowledge in commercial interior space 
*   Establish the skill of developing design concept   
*   Articulate the client’s needs and investigate branding 
*   Develop the skill of designing residential interior space 

  
教學進度與主題   
   
This class introduces the fundamental knowledge in commercial space design, such as display system, lighting design, graphic design, branding, and spatial design. Students expect to develop two commercial space design based on the requirement.   
The first assignment is to design museum shop display where we visit the NTNU art museum to observe the site, and the other is commercial space provided by the guest instructor.  

  
教學進度與主題 

(1) Museum Shop Display 

(2) Commercial space provided by the guest instructor
